summary: This module implements the logic for constructing and serializing syndication feeds (e.g., Atom/RSS) for a CKAN data portal. It defines a feed manager that aggregates entries, handles enclosure limits, and provides utilities for URL handling, parameter parsing, and text sanitization.
business_intent: Enable external applications and users to consume CKAN catalog updates through standard feed formats, facilitating content distribution and integration with feed readers or aggregators.
